title: baked soufflé with dandelion and walnut salad
description: James' cheese soufflé makes an impressive brunch if you have friends over. Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you need four ramekins or soufflé dishes.
ingredients: 40g/1½oz softened butter, plus extra for buttering
40g/1½oz plain flour, plus extra for flouring
125g/4½oz hard cheese (such as Old Winchester orLincolnshire poacher), grated
100g/3½oz hard cheese (such as Old Winchester or Lincolnshire poacher), grated
